text: Aber-arad is a village in the Welsh principal area of Carmarthenshire. Aber- Arad lies less than one mile to the east of Newcastle Emlyn. In 1870–72, John Marius Wilson in the Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales described Aber Arad as: > ABERARAD, a village in the parish of Kenarth, Carmarthen; a mile east of > Newcastle-Emlyn. ==References== Category:Villages in Carmarthenshire Category:Newcastle Emlyn
title: Aber-arad
